title: Examinations
context: §76-18 Examinations. There shall be examinations for testing the fitness and ability of applicants for positions in civil service. The director shall adopt rules to administer the examination programs. [L 1955, c 274, pt of §1; RL 1955, §3-21(a); am L 1957, c 198, §1; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §11; am L 1967, c 42, §1; HRS §76-18; am L 1984, c 101, §2; am L 1992, c 33, §1; am L 1994, c 56, §21; am L 2000, c 253, §16]
